title: Shifu Trojan Shifu
extract: A brand-new advanced banking Trojan discovered in the wild has been named “Shifu” by IBM Security X-Force, after the Japanese word for thief. ... Due to the capabilities Shifu presents, it is considered a highly sophisticated banking Trojan.Aug 31, 2015
extract_html: A brand-new advanced banking Trojan discovered in the wild has been named “Shifu” by IBM Security X-Force, after the Japanese word for thief. ... Due to the capabilities Shifu presents, it is considered a highly sophisticated banking Trojan.Aug 31, 2015
